thread.title: Good Omen Bottling, LLC® Appoints Dale Kamarata as Chief Operating Officer

author: cnbc.com
title: Good Omen Bottling, LLC® Appoints Dale Kamarata as Chief Operating Officer
text:
COTTONWOOD, Ariz., March 13, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Good Omen Bottling, LLC®, the manufacturer of the Wild Tonic®---the smooth, subtle, and sophisticated Jun Kombucha that is taking the country by storm--is pleased to announce the appointment of Dale Kamarata as Chief Operating Officer (COO). Mr. Kamarata brings extensive experience in the beverage industry and expertise in maximizing productivity and growth. As COO, Mr. Kamarata will lay the foundation for the next stage of the organization's growth.
Wild Tonic® Founder and Jun Kombucha pioneer, Holly Lyman described Dale as:
"A natural born leader, grounded in a solid work ethic. Moving fluidly between International giants, including: American Italian Pasta Company, Target, and Coca-Cola, he has established himself as an organizational guru. A man of profound faith and impressive community contributions, Dale is a natural for this new position. Under his leadership, we are nurturing individual talents and promoting growth from within. Ultimately, we are seeking to build brand awareness, for our growing line of innovative, raw honey-infused ferments and to garner support for bee conservation, specifically the Flagstaff, Arizona-based Northern Arizona Organic Beekeepers Association (NAOBA)."
"I am pleased and proud to be part of this innovative and rapidly expanding young company," said Mr. Kamarata. "That each individual here believes deeply in our product, our team, and our mission," he continued "is truly unique." He concluded by saying "as a company, we have a responsibility to our community, to help our associates be successful; honesty and transparency are among my core operating principles."
Mr. Kamarata joins Wild Tonic® with over 30 years of organizational experience and operational expertise. He has a diversified background ranging from leadership positions with AT&T, Smith Pipe & Steel, QUIKRETE, Imperial Laminators, and American Italian Pasta Company to Target Corporation, Coca-Cola Refreshments, and Swire Coca-Cola USA. A successful inventor, Kamarata is also the Founder, Executive Director and CEO of Estrella Youth Sports League and a Carrier of the Flame for the 2012 Summer Olympics in London.
About Good Omen Bottling, LLC®
At Wild Tonic®, our uncompromising commitment to quality and unbridled passion for innovation and bee conservation informs all that we brew! Whether fermenting our unique variety of Jun Kombucha with honey rather than cane-sugar, or pioneering brewing processes that maximize the integrity of probiotics, within each cobalt blue glass bottle lies the most exquisitely crafted energy elixir you've ever experienced! We thank you for making this one-of-a-kind Jun Kombucha part of your healthy lifestyle!
To learn more about the Wild Tonic ® brand, visit www.wildtonic.com .
